question: You find yourself in a dark forest. Which direction do you want to go?
You encounter a river. Do you want to swim across or walk along the bank?
You find a cave. Do you want to enter or keep walking?
You see a mountain in the distance. Do you want to climb it or go around?
You find a village. Do you want to enter or keep walking?
You successfully swim across the river and find a treasure chest. Do you want to open it?
You walk along the bank and find a bridge. Do you want to cross it?
You enter the cave and find a sleeping dragon. Do you want to sneak past it or leave?
You keep walking and find a hidden path. Do you want to take it?
You climb the mountain and find a wise old man. Do you want to talk to him?
You go around the mountain and find a beautiful valley. Do you want to explore it?
You enter the village and find a market. Do you want to buy something?
You keep walking and find a mysterious traveler. Do you want to talk to him?
You open the treasure chest and find gold coins. Do you want to take them?
You decide not to open the treasure chest and continue your journey. Do you want to go north or south?
You cross the bridge and find a castle. Do you want to enter?
You decide not to cross the bridge and continue along the river. Do you want to go north or south?
You successfully sneak past the dragon and find a hidden treasure. Do you want to take it?
You leave the cave and continue your journey. Do you want to go north or south?
You take the hidden path and find a secret garden. Do you want to explore it?
You decide not to take the hidden path and continue your journey. Do you want to go north or south?
You talk to the wise old man and he gives you a magical amulet. Do you want to wear it?
You decide not to talk to the wise old man and continue your journey. Do you want to go north or south?
You explore the beautiful valley and find a hidden waterfall. Do you want to swim in it?
You decide not to explore the beautiful valley and continue your journey. Do you want to go north or south?
You buy something from the market and find a map. Do you want to follow it?
You decide not to buy anything from the market and continue your journey. Do you want to go north or south?
You talk to the mysterious traveler and he gives you a quest. Do you want to accept it?
You decide not to talk to the mysterious traveler and continue your journey. Do you want to go north or south?
You take the gold coins and become rich. Do you want to retire?
You decide not to take the gold coins and continue your journey. Do you want to go north or south?
You enter the castle and find a throne room. Do you want to sit on the throne?
You decide not to enter the castle and continue your journey. Do you want to go north or south?
You decide to go north and find a hidden treasure. Do you want to take it?
You decide to go south and find a hidden path. Do you want to take it?
